Key Match Events: LeBron James had 39 points, seven rebounds, and six assists
Cam Reddish had his best game of the season with 15 points, six rebounds, two assists, and two steals
The Memphis Grizzlies' bench outscored the LA Lakers' bench 52-33
Post-Match Reflections: The Memphis Grizzlies improved to 5-4 following their 131-114 win
The LA Lakers dropped to 4-4 after another loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Davis was ruled out due to a left heel injury
Jaxson Hayes started the game in his place
Ja Morant and Jaren Jackson Jr. combined for 14 first-quarter points
The Grizzlies leaned on a balanced attack led by Ja Morant and Jaren Jackson Jr.
Others: The game was played on November 6, 2024
The LA Lakers lost 131-114 to the Memphis Grizzlies
The Memphis Grizzlies had a 131-114 win
